author_ssm: Samuel Ball, updated by Brad Bauer, 2020
abstract_ssm: The Chris Kutschera ephemera collection contains books, pamphlets, brochures, postcards, maps, and other ephemera acquired by Kutschera during his time as a journalist covering the Middle East, North Africa, Central Asia, and the USSR.  Much of the collection is made up of travel-related materials: maps, guidebooks, and  exhibition catalogues.
corpname_ssm: NYU Abu Dhabi, Archives and Special Collections
